resources.string: Dismiss
Snooze
Your battery temperature is too low, please disconnect the charger!
Your battery is over temperature, please remove the battery!
Your battery is over voltage, please remove the battery!
Your charger is over voltage, please disconnect the charger!
Your battery is over current-protection, please remove the battery!
Charge time is too long, please disconnect the charger!
Moisture is detected, please plug out USB cable and dry the USB connector
Please check the USB connector
Moisture is detected, please dry the USB connector. It will take some time to dry completely.
The overheating of the communication module is cleared. All the communication functions are restored.

The data service is limited due to the overheating of the communication module. If the overheating continues, the communication module will be shut down. Please move to a cool place with good signal, or turn off 4G in settings.
